        // after loop, check if there is an ongoing run

import java.io.*;

public class Main {
    public static Scanner obj = new Scanner(System.in);
    public static PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(System.out);

    public static void main(String[] args) {

        while (t-- != 0) {
            int n = obj.nextInt();
            String s = obj.next();
            long ans = n;

                        current_length += 2;
                        prev_pair = current_pair;
                    }
                }
            }
            out.println(ans);
        }
        out.flush();
    }
}
